title: Which labeled point is KE the greatest

content.question: A ball is suspended by a lightweight string, as shown in the figure above. The ball is displaced to position 1 and released. The four labeled positions are evenly spaced along the arc of the ballâ€™s motion. Between which adjacent pairs of positions is the change in kinetic energy of the ball greatest?

choices.label: The change is the same for all adjacent pairs.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
